Command.CommandString: SELECT top {1} WCS_TASK.*,Flag, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' and TaskAB ='A' then Aisle.InStationAddress when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' and TaskAB ='B' then Aisle.InStationAddress1 when WCS_TASK.TaskType in ('12','13') then WCS_TASK.CellCode else '' end) FromStation, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' then WCS_TASK.CellCode when (WCS_TASK.TaskType='12' or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='13' and Flag=6)) and TaskAB='A' then Aisle.OutStationAddress when (WCS_TASK.TaskType='12' or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='13' and Flag=6)) and TaskAB='B' then Aisle.OutStationAddress1 when WCS_TASK.TaskType='13' and Flag=3 then WCS_TASK.ToCellCode else '' end) ToStation,Aisle.InStationNo,aisle.OutStationNo FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Aisle Aisle on WCS_TASK.AisleNo=Aisle.AisleNo left join cmd_BillType BillType on BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode where WCS_TASK.TaskType!='99' and {0} order by TaskAB, TaskDate desc,WCS_TASK.TaskLevel,TaskID,SubTaskID

insert into WCS_TASK(TaskID, SubTaskID, TaskNo, BillTypeCode, TaskType, TaskLevel, Palletcode, DeviceNo, AisleNo, CellCode, ToCellCode, State, TaskDate,Type,from_location_id,to_location_id,from_aisle,to_aisle,location_id,AreaCode,TaskAB) select task_id, subtask_id, dbo.CreateTaskNo() as TaskNO, case when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 and from_location_id in ('U00','M00') then '001' when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 and from_location_id not in ('U00','M00') then '010' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 and type not like 'MRG%' and to_location_id Not in ('U99','M99') then '020' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 and type like 'MRG%' and to_location_id Not in ('U99','M99') and to_qty=0 then '090' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 and to_location_id ='U99' then '100' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 and from_aisle=to_aisle then '030' when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '080' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 and from_aisle!=to_aisle then '070' end as BillTypeCode, case when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then '11' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '12' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then '13' when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '99' end as TaskType, AsrsTask_TMP.priority, hu_id, case when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then toAisle.DeviceNo when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then fromAisle.DeviceNo when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then fromAisle.DeviceNo when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '' end as DeviceNo , case when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then toAisle.AisleNo when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then fromAisle.AisleNo when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then fromAisle.AisleNo when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '' end as AisleNo, case when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then ToCell.CellCode when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then ToCell.CellCode when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then fromCell.CellCode when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '' end as CellCode, case when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then '' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '' when LEN(from_location_id)=6 and LEN(to_location_id)=6 then ToCell.CellCode when LEN(from_location_id)=3 and LEN(to_location_id)=3 then '' end as toCellCode, 0 as state,getdate() as TaskDate,Type,from_location_id,to_location_id,from_aisle,to_aisle,location_id,equipment,'A' from AsrsTask_TMP left join CMD_Cell fromCell on AsrsTask_TMP.from_location_id=fromCell.CellName left join CMD_Cell ToCell on AsrsTask_TMP.to_location_id=ToCell.CellName left join CMD_AisleDevice fromAisle on AsrsTask_TMP.from_aisle=fromAisle.AisleNo and fromAisle.AreaCode=AsrsTask_TMP.equipment left join CMD_AisleDevice toAisle on AsrsTask_TMP.to_aisle=toAisle.AisleNo and toAisle.AreaCode=AsrsTask_TMP.equipment where task_id=@TaskID and status='ACK'
update WCS_TASK set AisleNo=CMD_Aisle.AisleNo from WCS_TASK cross join CMD_Aisle where TaskNo=@TaskNo and InStationNo=@InStationNo
update AsrsTask_TMP set status=@status where subtask_id=@subtaskid
update cmd_cell set PalletCode='',InDate=null where CellCode=@CellCode
select * from View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE {0} ORDER BY AreaCode,ShelfCode,CellCode
select top 1 * from WCS_TASK where AreaCode='ML' and TaskType='11' and State in (1,2) and AisleNo=@AisleNo order by RequestDate desc
